name: End-to-End Insurance Application Workflow - Complete User Journey
description: Comprehensive test covering the complete happy path workflow from creating insured, registration, quote generation, application submission, to acceptance and IMS flow initiation

background.text: the insurance application system is running
I have valid UW credentials to access the system

scenarios.name: Complete end-to-end happy path - Full insurance application workflow

steps.text: I am on the UW login page
I enter my valid UW credentials and log in
I navigate to the insured management section
I create an active insured with company name 'TestCorp Insurance' and email 'testcorp@example.com'
I should see the insured created successfully
I navigate to the registration section
I register using the same company name 'TestCorp Insurance' and email 'testcorp@example.com'
I submit the registration form
I should see the record in the list with submission status as 'Pending Quick Quote'
I edit the same record from the list
I fill in all required details for the application
I generate the quick quote successfully
I proceed to continue with the application
I should see the application tabs available for completion
I navigate to the Drivers and Vehicles tab
I upload the driver template with valid driver information
I manually update vehicle details for additional vehicles
I save the drivers and vehicles information
I should see all drivers and vehicles saved successfully
I navigate to the Coverages tab
I select Motor Truck Cargo (MTC), General Liability (GL), and Physical Damage (PD) coverages
I configure the coverage limits and deductibles for all selected coverages
I should see all selected coverages configured properly
I generate the complete application
I upload a PDF template file for Physical Damage coverage
I submit the complete application
I should see the application submitted successfully in the list view
I click on the ellipse menu for the submitted record
I select 'View Quote' option
I review the quote details
I click on 'Accept' button
I select 'Monthly' as the billing type
I confirm the quote acceptance
I should see the quote accepted successfully
the IMS flow should initiate automatically
I should see confirmation that the complete workflow has been processed

gherkin_content:
Feature: End-to-End Insurance Application Workflow - Complete User Journey
  Comprehensive test covering the complete happy path workflow from creating insured, registration, quote generation, application submission, to acceptance and IMS flow initiation

  Background:
    Given the insurance application system is running
    And I have valid UW credentials to access the system

  @e2e @happy-path @smoke @critical
  Scenario: Complete end-to-end happy path - Full insurance application workflow
    Given I am on the UW login page
    When I enter my valid UW credentials and log in
    And I navigate to the insured management section
    And I create an active insured with company name 'TestCorp Insurance' and email 'testcorp@example.com'
    Then I should see the insured created successfully
    When I navigate to the registration section
    And I register using the same company name 'TestCorp Insurance' and email 'testcorp@example.com'
    And I submit the registration form
    Then I should see the record in the list with submission status as 'Pending Quick Quote'
    When I edit the same record from the list
    And I fill in all required details for the application
    And I generate the quick quote successfully
    And I proceed to continue with the application
    Then I should see the application tabs available for completion
    When I navigate to the Drivers and Vehicles tab
    And I upload the driver template with valid driver information
    And I manually update vehicle details for additional vehicles
    And I save the drivers and vehicles information
    Then I should see all drivers and vehicles saved successfully
    When I navigate to the Coverages tab
    And I select Motor Truck Cargo (MTC), General Liability (GL), and Physical Damage (PD) coverages
    And I configure the coverage limits and deductibles for all selected coverages
    Then I should see all selected coverages configured properly
    When I generate the complete application
    And I upload a PDF template file for Physical Damage coverage
    And I submit the complete application
    Then I should see the application submitted successfully in the list view
    When I click on the ellipse menu for the submitted record
    And I select 'View Quote' option
    And I review the quote details
    And I click on 'Accept' button
    And I select 'Monthly' as the billing type
    And I confirm the quote acceptance
    Then I should see the quote accepted successfully
    And the IMS flow should initiate automatically
    And I should see confirmation that the complete workflow has been processed
